name: Korvae in space
description: Solve puzzles and shoot enemies in this fun little indie game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Windows XP SP2+ Memory: 150 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
